menu.name: disease
menu.title: Disease
menu.description: What disease did you have that you received treatment for and are reporting today (e.g., monkeypox, Long COVID, RASopathies)?

menu.title: Diagnosis Determination
menu.description: How was the diagnosis made?

menu.name: treatment-challenges
menu.title: Treatment Challenge
menu.description: What made your patient's infection difficult to treat?

menu.name: drugs
menu.title: Drug(s)
menu.description: What medicine(s) did you take for your condition?

menu.name: treatment-outcome
menu.title: Treatment Outcome
menu.description: What was the outcome of your treatment?

menu.name: adverse-events
menu.title: Adverse Events
menu.description: Did you have any side effects from the medicine?

menu.name: pregnancy
menu.title: Pregnancy
menu.description: Were you pregnant during the treatment of your condition?

menu.name: reminder
menu.title: Reminder
menu.description: Would you like a reminder to update this form (e.g., if you are still on treatment)?

menu.name: demographics
menu.title: Patient Demographics
menu.description: Tell us about yourself:

menu.name: country
menu.title: Country
menu.description: Country in which you were infected or treated

menu.name: year
menu.title: Year
menu.description: When did you start taking the medicine for this infection?

menu.name: other-conditions
menu.title: Other Conditions
menu.description: Do you have any of these conditions?

menu.name: gestational-age
menu.title: Pregnancy
menu.description: How many weeks pregnant were you when you began treatment (round to the nearly week)?

menu.name: clinical-presentation
menu.title: Clinical Presentation
menu.description: Where on your body were your rash/skin lesions?

menu.name: tb-clinical-presentation
menu.title: Clinical Presentation
menu.description: Describe the clinical presentation:

menu.name: mp-clinical-presentation
menu.title: Site of Lesions
menu.description: Describe the clinical presentation:

menu.name: unusual
menu.title: Unusual
menu.description: Was there anything else about your infection that you would like to share?

menu.name: organism
menu.title: Organism
menu.description: What is the organism(s) causing the disease, if known/applicable?

menu.name: resistance
menu.title: Resistance
menu.description: To which drugs, if any, was the organism resistant?

menu.name: tb-resistance
menu.title: Resistance
menu.description: To which drugs, if any, was the organism resistant?

menu.name: dosing-regimen
menu.title: Dosing regimen
menu.description: What dosing regimen did you use for ${drug}?

menu.name: additional-details
menu.title: Additional details
menu.description: How was ${drug} used in a new way?

menu.name: treatment-setting
menu.title: Treatment Setting
menu.description: Where were you treated for your infection (e.g., at a clinic, admitted to the hospital)?

menu.name: adverse-events-outcome
menu.title: Adverse Event Outcome
menu.description: You stated that you experienced a side effect from the medication. What was the outcome attributed to this adverse event/side effect?

menu.name: previous-treatment
menu.title: Previous Treatment
menu.description: What medicine, if any, did you take previously to treat your infection?

menu.name: surgery
menu.title: Surgery
menu.description: Did the patient have surgery as part of the control of their infection?

menu.name: outcome-determination
menu.title: Outcome Determination
menu.description: How did you determine the outcome?

menu.name: outcome-timing
menu.title: Outcome Timing
menu.description: When did you assess the outcome?

menu.name: relapse
menu.title: Relapse
menu.description: Did your infection come back after you finished your medicine?

menu.name: other
menu.title: Other
menu.description: Is there any other important information you would like to add?
